messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Nobunaga still = Hitler - WHO CARES?!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey. I don t care for me too posts, but I agree, Nate.  Enough of this already.  FROM ALL SIDES.  We ve been on this topic for a week and more now, and quite
messages.messageBody:
Hey.
I don't care for me too posts, but I agree, Nate. Enough of this
already. FROM ALL SIDES. We've been on this topic for a week and more now, and
quite frankly, I'm getting really sick of it. From the posts I've read, we've
gotten exactly nowhere except to the point of bickering and going off-topic
(widely!). The question about whether Nobunaga and Hitler or Vlad Tepes
(Dracula) or Ivan IV (the Terrible) are comparable are good for a couple days or so
as long as they stay on topic. But when we get to what's going around now, it
is to the point of asking "WHO CARES?!", a point we passed a long time ago.
I'm to the point of deleting the messages simply whenever I see this subject,
I'm so sick of how this subject is turning out.

Peace out.
Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
